item.title: BBL ScatterBat
item.description: Introducing ScatterBat! ScatterBat displays every combination of runs scored and balls faced in Big Bash cricket. Every time that a new combination is scored, a blue square will colour in the space on the figure. Currently there have been 1,137 entries. This next table allows you to pin-point every innings that is displayed on ScatterBat. Keep in mind, this only displays the first time that each combination has occurred.

item.title: BBL Batting Analytics
item.description: As BBL|08 is upon us, I decided to take a look over the past seven seasons and understand the Big Bash from a statistical standpoint. To be able to have such a large dataset has been a lot of fun and Iâ€™d love suggestions for further comparisons to be made. This first article will focus on batsmen, with future articles to follow on bowlers and teams. This is also my first attempt at writing a blog post within RMarkdown, so be with me.
